definition: see 大旱望雲霓|大旱望云霓[da4 han4 wang4 yun2 ni2]
pinyin: da4 han4 zhi1 wang4 yun2 ni2

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
lit. looking for rain clouds in times of drought (idiom)/fig. desperate for an escape from a difficult situation
to stand on tiptoe and crane one's neck (idiom); fig. to yearn for sth
lit. the crisis of being hanged upside down (idiom); fig. extremely critical situation/dire straits
lit. the crisis of being hanged upside down (idiom); fig. extremely critical situation/dire straits
to look forward eagerly to sth/keenly desired
to receive troops with food and drink (idiom)/to give troops a hearty welcome/also pr. [dan1 si4 hu2 jiang1]
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree/to overrate oneself (idiom)
famine repeats unceasingly (idiom, from Book of Songs)
